1.0 Where can i find the To-do option?

 HelloNotes provides To-do list within every notes you make.open a note and slide your note to the left to add a To-do.


1.1 How can i set the reminder for each To-do?

 With each To-do you make,you get a notify me checkbox which you could check to set the reminder.


1.2 How can i turn off the To-do reminder?

 disable the notification by unchecking the notify me checkbox in the To-do.


1.3 How can i share my notes?

 You can share your notes by clicking on the share icon available at the bottom end of each notes.
